column2: §BJade Dragon:§! Valyrian Invasions
Valyria will launch both Tributary wars and Major Invasions. Valyrian Adventurers can spawn.
Only Adventurers
Valyria can NOT launch Tributary wars or Major Invasions. Valyrian Adventurers can spawn.
No Major Invasions
Valyria will launch Tributary wars but will NOT launch Major Invasions. Valyrian Adventurers can spawn.
Freehold Invasions
The Freehold will never invade Western Essos or Westeros.
Freehold Interaction
Within Range
Only characters within Valyria's Diplomatic Range can use Favor Actions.
Anyone
Any character in the world can use Favor Actions.
Freehold
§Y*§! Valyria will §YNOT§! declare any wars\n§Y*§! The §YSend Tribute§! and §YRequest Boon§! decisions are §RDisabled§!
§Y*§! Valyria might stage §YMajor Invasions§!
Open Borders

§Y*§! Imperial Tributaries can raise Valyrian Regiments to help them in wars. Because of this stability the Archon is more likely to deal with outsiders and is currently enjoying a time of peace and prosperity.
The borders of the Freehold are currently open and the Archon welcomes outsiders to deal with him.
Because of this open-border policy the Archon is willing to accept and send gifts to his most faithful allies and closest friends.
Stable

The [Root.GetName] is experiencing a period of internal stability, and trade with the East is profitable. Without any large-scale disasters or powerful enemies prosperity is able to spread, and the military might of Valyria stands ready to defend both its own wealth and its loyal tributaries.
Unrest

Civil unrest runs rampant in the [Root.GetName], and it has thrown the trade routes with the East into disarray. Valyria's armies are occupied internally in an attempt to keep the peace, and unless the unrest is quelled soon a full-blown civil war may well erupt at any moment.
§Y*§! Imperial Tributaries can §RNOT§! raise Valyrian Regiments to help them in wars\n§Y*§! This Status might result in a §RCivil War§!
Civil War

Civil war has erupted in the [Root.GetName], and trade with the East suffers as a result. Valyria's armies are arrayed against one another, and the ruling dynasty itself is threatened. Intrepid generals may well seek their fortune in the West, beyond Valyria's borders.

§Y*§! The value of the Silk Road is reduced by §R50%§!
§Y*§! Imperial Tributaries can §RNOT§! raise Valyrian Regiments
§Y*§! Imperial Tributaries can Break Free without opposition from Valyria
§Y*§! Might end with China getting a §RNew Dynasty§!, resetting all §YGrace§!
Dothraki Invasion

The Dothraki hordes of the north pour into Valyria, lead by their mighty Khals. The mighty Valyrian armies are occupied with their desperate defense of their homeland, and the fighting has greatly disrupted trade as well as caused a mass exodus of refugees. Scions of the current dynasty may well flee westward if the war goes poorly enough.
§Y*§! Imperial Tributaries can §RNOT§! raise Valyrian Regiments\n§Y*§! Valyrian refugees might appear in your court\n§Y*§! Might end with Valyria getting a §RNew Dynasty§!, resetting all §YGrace§!
Rhoynish Invasion

The people of the great river Rhoyne have descended upon Valyria itself, led by their water sorcerers and commanders. The mighty Valyrian armies are occupied with their desperate defense of their homeland, and the fighting has greatly disrupted trade as well as caused a mass exodus of refugees. Scions of the current dynasty may well flee westward if the war goes poorly enough.
§Y*§! Imperial Tributaries can §RNOT§! raise Valyrian Regiments\n§Y*§! Valyrian refugees might appear in your court\n§Y*§! Might end with Valyria getting a §RNew Dynasty§!, resetting all §YGrace§!
Ghiscari Invasion

The great armies of the empire of Slaver's Bay have rampaged the Valyrian islands and colonies on its way to the Valyrian homeland. The mighty Valyrian armies are occupied with their desperate defense of their homeland, and the fighting has greatly disrupted trade as well as caused a mass exodus of refugees. Scions of the current dynasty may well flee westward if the war goes poorly enough.
§Y*§! Imperial Tributaries can §RNOT§! raise Valyrian Regiments\n§Y*§! Valyrian refugees might appear in your court\n§Y*§! Might end with Valyria getting a §RNew Dynasty§!, resetting all §YGrace§!
Famine

A disastrous harvest has caused the Valyrian agriculture to buckle under the population. The calamity has caused most trade to cease, and even as their numbers dwindle, the [offmap_china.GetName]'s once-mighty armies have been burdened with relief efforts for the suffering.
§Y*§! Imperial Tributaries can §RNOT§! raise Valyrian Regiments
Plague

A terrible disease wracks the [Root.GetName], leaving thousands lying dead in its wake. Trade has ground to a halt as the Valyrian economy has been forced to its knees, and even the Freehold's armies have been decimated to but a shadow of their former glory.
§Y*§! Imperial Tributaries can §RNOT§! raise Valyrian Regiments
Internal Purge
Pressured by the ever-increasing numbers of nobility, the Emperor has started a purge of Valyrian nobility. Thousands of the noble class have been killed, and some seek to move West for safety.
Economic Ruin
Running a large empire is financially stressful, and the Valyrian economy has plunged into depths never imagined possible. The nobility dream of moving west to leave this money-barren land.
Golden Age

The [Root.GetName] has reached untold power and wealth. As Valyria flourishes, the trade routes with the East bring not only valuable goods in previously unheard-of quantities, but also rich and abundant examples of Valyrian culture. An Emperor of the Freehold in this Golden Age may well rightfully consider [Root.Ruler.GetHerselfHimself] the [Root.Ruler.GetMasterMistress] of the known world.
Raise Valyrian Honor Guard
Must be the §YPrimary Attacker§! or §YPrimary Defender§! in a war
Has NOT already raised the Honor Guard
Raise Valyrian Regiment
Tributaries of Valyria can raise a special regiment of Valyrian troops to assist them in defensive wars.
You are NOT defending against another tributary of [offmap_china.GetShortName]
Must NOT already have raised a Valyrian Regiment

My §YSuzerain§! is weak and unable to prevent me from simply not paying them further tribute.

Made me a Tributary State
Stop Paying Tribute
The §Y[offmap_china.GetName]§! is in a weakened state and unable to prevent me from simply not paying them further tribute.
Compose a Book
Provided §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! possesses some knowledge of the world, you can choose to compose a work of literature.
column3: Puisque [Root.Get_le_Title]§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! possède des connaissances sur le monde, vous pouvez choisir de composer une œuvre de littérature.
column4: Vorausgesetzt §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! besitzt einige Kenntnisse, könnt ihr ein literarisches Werk schreiben.
column6: Siempre que §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! posea cierto conocimiento del mundo, puedes elegir que escriba una obra de literatura.

The Emperor Likes
The Emperor Dislikes
The Emperor Likes $CURRENT|Y$

§LValyrian Emperors have varying interests and tastes. This has a big impact on all actions when trying to gain the Emperor's Favor. The Emperor takes note both of your own qualities (e.g. Culture) and those of your specific offering (e.g. a Concubine)...§!
column3: §LLes empereurs chinois ont des intérêts et des goûts variés, ce qui compte beaucoup lorsqu'il s'agit d'obtenir la Grâce de l'Empereur. L'empereur prend en compte vos propres caractéristiques (par exemple la culture) et celles de votre offre (par exemple une concubine)...§!
column4: §LChinesische Kaiser haben unterschiedliche Interessen und Geschmäcke. Das hat einen großen Einfluss auf alle Handlungen die man durchführt, um die Gunst des Kaisers zu gewinnen. Der Kaiser nimmt Kenntnis von sowohl Euren eigenen Eigenschaften (z.B. Kultur), als auch denen eines bestimmten Angebots (z.B. Konkubinen)...§!
column6: Los §Lemperadores chinos tienen diversos gustos e intereses. Esto tiene un gran impacto en todas las acciones cuando se quiere ganar la gracia del emperador. El Emperador se fija tanto en tus cualidades propias (p.ej. cultura) y las de tu ofrenda específica (p.ej. una concubina)…§!

column2: Request a Peace Deal
Send a request to §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§!, asking for peaceful relations with the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! and its §Y[Root.Offmap.Governor.GetTitle]§!.
column3: Envoyer une demande à l'§Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§!, en demandant des relations pacifiques avec §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! et son §Y[Root.Offmap.Governor.GetTitle]§! .
column4: Entsendet an §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§! eine Anfrage auf friedliche Beziehungen mit §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! und seinen §Y[Root.Offmap.Governor.GetTitle]§!.
column6: Solicitar al §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§! tener relaciones pacíficas con el §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! y su §Y[Root.Offmap.Governor.GetTitle]§!

column2: \nDuring the peace deal, the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! and its §Y[Root.Offmap.Governor.GetTitle]§! will not declare war on you. It will last for §Y50§! years or until the dynasty of the [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle], [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName], ends.
column3: \nPendant l'accord de paix, l'§Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! et son §Y[Root.Offmap.Governor.GetTitle]§! ne vous déclareront pas la guerre. Il durera §Y50§! ans ou jusqu'à la fin de la dynastie de l'[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle], les [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName].
column4: \nWährend des Friedensvertrages werden Euch §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! und seine §Y[Root.Offmap.Governor.GetTitle]§! keinen Krieg erklären. Er wird für §Y50§! Jahre andauern oder bis die Dynastie von [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName] endet.
column6: \nMientras dure el acuerdo de paz, el §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! y su §Y[Root.Offmap.Governor.GetTitle]§! no te declararán la guerra. Durará §Y50§! años o hasta que cambie la dinastía [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName] del [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle].

column2: Become Tributary

Pledge your allegiance to §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§!, who will become your suzerain. While this comes with new responsibilities and restricts your freedom, you will also enjoy certain privileges.
column3: Jurer allégeance à l'§Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§!, qui deviendra votre suzerain. Bien que cela comporte de nouvelles responsabilités et limite votre liberté, vous bénéficierez également de certains privilèges.
column4: Versprecht Eure Treue gegenüber §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§!, der Euer Suzerän wird. Auch wenn dies mit neuen Aufgaben und Beschränkungen Eurer Freiheit verbunden ist, kommt es auch mit neuen Privilegien einher.
column6: Jura lealtad a §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§!, quien se convertirá en tu soberano. Si bien esto trae nuevas responsabilidades y restringe tu libertad, también disfrutarás de ciertos privilegios.

column2: Supply Horses

Nomadic realms can please the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! by sending them a continuous supply of horses. For as long as you supply horses, you will gain a ticking amount of §GGrace§! in exchange for a small penalty to your §YManpower§!. You can at any point stop supplying horses, but if you do you will not be able to start supplying them again with the same character. While you are supplying horses Valyria is less likely to invade you.
column3: Les pays nomades peuvent plaire à l'§Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! en lui fournissant continuellement des chevaux. Tant que vous lui en envoyez, vous recevrez de la §GGrâce§! en échange d'une petite pénalité en §Yeffectifs§!. Vous pouvez à tout moment arrêter de fournir des chevaux, mais si vous le faites, vous ne pourrez pas recommencer avec le même personnage. Lorsque vous fournissez des chevaux, la Chine est moins susceptible de vous envahir.
column4: Nomadische Reiche können §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! zufrieden stellen, indem sie ihnen kontinuierlich Pferde liefern. Für die Dauer der Versorgung erhaltet Ihr wachsende §GGunst§! im Austausch für etwas §YMannstärke§!. Ihr könnt zwar zu jeder Zeit aufhören, aber könnt dann mit demselben Charakter nicht erneut Pferde liefern. Während der Versorgung mit Pferden ist es weniger wahrscheinlich, dass Euch China angreift.
column6: Los reinos nómadas pueden complacer a §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! enviándoles un suministro continuo de caballos. Mientras los sigas entregando, irás ganando una cantidad constante de §GGracia§! a cambio de una pequeña penalización a tu §Ysoldadesca§!. Puedes dejar de enviar caballos en cualquier momento, pero si lo haces, no podrás volver a suministrarlos con el mismo personaje. Mientras suministres caballos, será menos probable que China te invada.

column2: Supplying Horses to Valyria
This nomadic ruler is supplying Valyria with horses.
column3: Ce dirigeant nomade approvisionne la Chine en chevaux.
column4: Der nomadische Herrscher versorgt China mit Pferden
column6: Este gobernante nómada suministra caballos a China.

column3: Ne fournit pas déjà des chevaux

column3: N'a pas précédemment choisi d'arrêter d'envoyer des chevaux

column6: NO ha elegido dejar de suministrar caballos

column2: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has graciously accepted your offer of supplying [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHis] army with magnificent steeds.

column4: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\n[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetDerDie] himmlische [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName] hat Euer Angebot [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHis]e Armee mit kräftigen Stuten zu versorgen, dankend angenommen.
column6: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nEl celeste [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName] ha aceptado gentilmente tu oferta de abastecer a su ejército con magníficos sementales.

column2: May they trample your enemies!
Stop Supplying Horses
If you no longer require the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!'s grace, you can choose to stop supplying horses to them. You will be unable to start supplying horses again with this character.
column3: Si n'avez plus besoin de la Grâce de §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!, vous pouvez choisir de ne plus l'approvisionner en chevaux. Il vous sera impossible de le refaire avec ce personnage.
column4: Wenn Ihr die Gunst von §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! nicht länger benötigt, könnt ihr die Versorgung mit Pferden beenden. Ihr könnt dann allerdings mit diesem Charakter nicht wieder mit der Lieferung beginnen.
column6: Si ya no necesitas la gracia de §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!, puedes dejar de suministrarle caballos. No podrás volver a suministrar caballos con este personaje.

column2: Send a Commander
As the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! is in a state of turmoil, you can offer up one of your most gifted commanders to go and join the [Root.Offmap.GetShortName] Army as an auxiliary officer.
column3: Puisque l'§Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! traverse une période de troubles, vous pourriez leur proposer d'envoyer un de vos plus talentueux commandants afin qu'il rejoigne l'armée de la [Root.Offmap.GetShortName] en tant qu'officier auxiliaire.
column4: Da §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! in einem Zustand der Aufruhr ist, können wir ihnen anbieten, einen unserer begabtesten Kommandanten zu schicken, um der [Root.Offmap.GetShortName]-Armee als Hilfsoffizier beizutreten.
column6: Como el §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! está en un estado de caos puedes ofrecer a uno de tus comandantes de mayor talento para unirse al ejército de [Root.Offmap.GetShortName] como oficial auxiliar.

column2: Has NOT sent a commander in 20 years
column3: N'a pas envoyé de commandant en 20 ans
column4: Hat in den letzten 20 Jahren KEINEN Kommandanten entsendet
column6: NO ha enviado un comandante en 20 años

column2: §YRecently Sent Commander§!
You have recently sent a Commander to Valyria, if Valyria is still in turmoil you will be able to send another one on: §Y[Root.chinese_grace_send_commander_timer.GetExpiryDate]§!
column3: Vous avez récemment envoyé un commandant à la Chine. Si la Chine est encore en période de troubles, vous pourrez en envoyer un autre le §Y[Root.chinese_grace_send_commander_timer.GetExpiryDate]§!
column4: Ihr habt erst kürzlich einen Kommandanten nach China entsendet. Wenn China weiterhin in Aufruhe ist, könnt ihr den nächsten am §Y[Root.chinese_grace_send_commander_timer.GetExpiryDate]§! senden
column6: Has enviado recientemente un comandante a China. Si China sigue sumida en el caos podrás enviar otro el: §Y[Root.chinese_grace_send_commander_timer.GetExpiryDate]§!

column2: Send a Physician

As the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! is being ravaged by a devastating plague, you can offer to send a medically-schooled individual to go and protect the Emperor from disease and infection. This interaction can only be taken once per character.
column3: Puisque l'§Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! est en train d'être ravagé par une peste dévastatrice, vous pouvez proposer d'envoyer un physicien protéger l'Empereur contre la maladie. Cette interaction ne peut être prise qu'une fois par personnage.
column4: Wenn das §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! von einer verheerenden Pest heimgesucht wird, könnt Ihr anbieten, eine medizinisch geschulte Person zu entsenden, um den Kaiser vor Krankheit und Infektion zu schützen. Diese Interaktion kann nur einmal pro Charakter eingesetzt werden.
column6: Como una peste devastadora está arrasando el §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!, puedes ofrecer enviar a un individuo que haya cursado medicina para proteger al emperador de la enfermedad y la infección. Esta interacción solo se puede tomar una vez por personaje.

column2: Has NOT sent a physician already
column3: N'a pas déjà envoyé de physicien
column4: Hat NICHT bereits einen Arzt geschickt
column6: Aún NO ha enviado un médico

column2: Launch a Relief Expedition
As the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! is suffering from a great famine, you can offer to send a relief expedition to deliver supplies and help the Emperor in maintaining the stability of China.\n
column3: Puisque l'§Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! subit une grande famine, vous pouvez proposer d'envoyer une expédition d'aide pour fournir des vivres et ainsi aider l'Empereur à maintenir la stabilité de la Chine.\n
column4: §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! leidet unter einer großen Hungersnot und Ihr könnt anbieten, Hilfsgüter zu liefern, um dem Kaiser bei der Aufrechterhaltung der Stabilität zu helfen.\n
column6: Como el §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! sufre una gran hambruna, puedes ofrecer enviar una expedición de socorro para entregar suministros y ayudar al emperador a mantener la estabilidad de China.\n

column2: Sending Relief to Valyria
column3: Envoyer une expédition d'aide en Chine

column2: Request Invasion

Ask the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! to declare war on another ruler with the intent of shattering their realm. If the war succeeds, any §YKingdoms or Empires§! held by the target will be §Rforcibly destroyed§!. Valyria only attacks realms of either §YKing or Empire tier§! which contain at least §Y40 Counties§!, as anything else would be too menial for them.
column3: Demandez à §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! de déclarer la guerre à un autre dirigeant dans le but de détruire leur pays. Si la guerre réussit, tout §Yroyaume ou empire§! détenu par la cible sera détruit. La Chine n'attaque que les pays de rang de royaume ou empire qui contiennent au moins §Y40 comtés§!.
column4: Fragt §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! einem anderen Herrscher den Krieg zu erklären, mit dem Ziel, ihr Reich zu zerstören. Wenn der Krieg gelingt, werden alle §YKönigreich- oder Reich-§! Titel, die der Charakter hält §Rzerstört§!. China greift nur Reiche der Stufe §YKönigreich oder Reich§! an, die mindestens §Y40 Grafschaften§! beherbergen, da alles andere für sie zu geringfügig wäre.
column6: Pedir al §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! que declare la guerra a otro gobernante para destruir su reino. Si la guerra tiene éxito, todo §Yreino o imperio§! que posea el enemigo será §Rdestruido a la fuerza§!. China solo ataca reinos del rango de §Yreino o Imperio§! que contengan al menos §Y40 condados§!, pues cualquier otra cosa sería de poca monta.

column2: Send Artifact
Send an invaluable artifact to §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§!.
Has NOT sent an artifact in 10 years
column3: N'a pas envoyé d'artefact depuis 10 ans
column4: Hat in den letzten 10Jahren KEIN Artefakt geschickt
column6: NO ha enviado un artefacto en 10 años

column2: Bow Before the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]

Journey to the inner lands of the §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§! and bow before the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] in an act of servitude. Performing a Bow will earn you §GGrace§! with the §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!, but it will cost you §RPrestige§! to do so.
column3: Voyager vers les terres intérieures de l'§Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§! et ployer le genou devant l'[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] en signe de servitude. Vous obtiendriez de la §GGrâce§! auprès de l'§Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!, mais vous perdrez en §Rprestige§!.
column4: Reist ins Kernland von §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§! und kniet vor [offmap_china.Ruler.Getdemder] [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] als Zeichen Euer Unterwerfung. Das Durchführen eines Kotau bringt Euch §YGunst§! bei §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!, kostet aber §RPrestige§!.
column6: Viaja al interior de la tierras de §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§! e inclínate ante el/ la [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] en un acto de sometimiento. Rendir pleitesía te conseguirá §Ggracia§! del [offmap_china.GetFullName], pero también te costará §Rprestigio§!.
